channel.title: Multiple Worlds
channel.description: I was following this guys tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520953.0.html and i get 4 errors when compiling can anyone help me correct them? [code]src\server\Server.java:65: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:81: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:105: error: cannot find symbol ServerSocket socket = null; ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server src\server\Server.java:107: error: cannot find symbol socket = new ServerSocket(world); ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Multiple Worlds
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I was following this guys tutorial:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


and i get 4 errors when compiling can anyone help me correct them?

src\server\Server.java:65: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:81: error: incompatible types File load = files; ^ required: File found: File[] src\server\Server.java:105: error: cannot find symbol ServerSocket socket = null; ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server src\server\Server.java:107: error: cannot find symbol socket = new ServerSocket(world); ^ symbol: class ServerSocket location: class Server Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
